DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the diagnostic efficacy of the Tinetti Assessment, Timed up and Go test (TUG) and Gait Speed on predicting fall risk in adults 65 years of age or greater who are community ambulators.
DOC.brief_title: Fall Risk Prediction and Reduction in Community Ambulators 65 Years of Age or Older
DOC.criteria: adults 65 years or older who are community ambulators. known neurological disorder;limitation secondary to recent orthopedic condition; currently resides at skilled nursing facility
